typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		maxid as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select max(id) as maxid from empdata',
	format: 'query') ~> maxiddata
source(output(
		first as string,
		eid as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 keyGenerate(output(id as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 derive(id = maxid#outputs()[1].maxid + id) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(deleteIf(equals(first,'aayush'))) ~> AlterRow1
maxiddata sink(mapColumn(
		maxid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	saveOrder: 0) ~> maxid
